text:
AUTO1 | https://www.auto1.com/en/ | Java/PHP/DevOps/QA/JavaScript/Python | Berlin, Germany | VISA

We're a well-stablished start-up, with really good press: https://www.cnbc.com/2018/09/10/top-10-attractive-start-ups-...

Despite of being part of the "billion dollar club startup" we are starving for new creations and developments. We are looking for all kinds of roles are from junior/starter, to Team Lead.

Take a look in here, and submit your application:https://www.auto1-group.com/jobs/
